short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and elegant to-do list displayed in the Chrome side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Side2Do is a simple and elegant Chrome extension for managing your tasks directly from the side panel.

Features :
	•	Integration in Chrome’s sidebar
	•	Minimalist and intuitive interface
	•	Quick task addition by selecting text in the browser
	•	Smart display of today’s tasks and upcoming ones
	•	Option to add a due date to each task
	•	Light and dark themes
	•	Multi-device sync to keep tasks up-to-date

Completely free and no data collection.
